biotools.summary: The Role of Circular RNA CDR1as/ciRS-7 in Regulating Tumor Microenvironment | CIBERSORT is an analytical tool developed by Newman et al. to provide an estimation of the abundances of member cell types in a mixed cell population, using gene expression data | Absolute mode (beta) is now available
